CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 38 In this contribution , we reported a new series of donor polymer materials based on benzodithiophene ( BDT ) and difluorinated dialkylthienylbenzothiadiazole , PffBB-n ( n = 10 , 12 , 14 , or 16 ) , which exhibited strong aggregation behavior in both solution and thin films.

Let's think step by step.

1. Benzodithiophene (BDT)
2. PffBB-n (where n = 10, 12, 14, or 16)

These are the material names mentioned in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. BDT (Benzodithiophene)
2. PffBB-n (where n = 10, 12, 14, or 16)

These are the entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to material names. All other entities in the paragraph are not material names but rather descriptors or parameters related to the materials.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Benzodithiophene (BDT) |
| PffBB-n (where n = 10, 12, 14, or 16) |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 38 In this contribution , we reported a new series of donor polymer materials based on benzodithiophene ( BDT ) and difluorinated dialkylthienylbenzothiadiazole , PffBB-n ( n = 10 , 12 , 14 , or 16 ) , which exhibited strong aggregation behavior in both solution and thin films.

Let's think step by step.

1. Benzodithiophene (BDT)
2. difluorinated dialkylthienylbenzothiadiazole
3. PffBB-n (n = 10, 12, 14, or 16)

These entities are likely to be considered as "Property Value" entities as they represent specific types or series of donor polymer materials mentioned in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. PffBB-n (n = 10, 12, 14, or 16)

The other entities (benzodithiophene and difluorinated dialkylthienylbenzothiadiazole) are not directly mentioned as having specific material properties, but rather as components of the donor polymer materials. The specific values (n = 10, 12, 14, or 16) can be considered as properties of the PffBB series of materials.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
